short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rich’s Auto Body have developed a reputation for professional automotive repair through over 30 years of honest service

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At Rich’s Auto Body, we have developed a reputation for professional automotive repair through over 30 years of honest service, quality work, and excellent prices. We are a fully licensed and certified independently operated business in Amherst, Ohio.
Honest pricing and courteous service are part of what has allowed us to be working with 3rd generation clients. All our employees are long-term, ASA-certified, and licensed by the state of Ohio.
High-quality replacement parts and repairs, qualified employees, and fast turnaround time make us the auto repair shop you can trust and count on to have your car running great in no time. We know how important your car is to you and we will treat it as if it were our own. Learn more about the auto repair services we offer.
